glosses: In an excessively casual and familiar way

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish لاابالی (la-ubāli, “(I care not), careless, free and easy”), from Arabic لَا أُبَالِي (lā ʔubālī, “I don't care”), from لَا (lā, “no, not”) and أُبَالِي (ʔubālī), non-past (imperfect) indicative of بَالَى (bālā, “to care about, to notice, to pay attention”).
